summary: Added update-status event handler to WezTerm config that tracks tab switches and automatically clears CLAUDE_STATUS user variable when switching to a notified tab. This makes the amber notification color reset when the user views the tab.

artifacts.summary: Added update-status event handler with tab tracking and CLAUDE_STATUS clearing logic
Implementation summary documenting the changes made to WezTerm configuration

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented automatic clearing of WezTerm tab notification color when switching to a notified tab. Added update-status event handler that tracks active tabs via wezterm.GLOBAL and clears CLAUDE_STATUS user variable via OSC escape sequence when tab becomes active.

next_steps: Rebuild NixOS config with home-manager to apply changes, then manually test notification behavior
